channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US and Iran talks brought back from the brink after White House relents on move to Oman
item.description: Talks that had been scheduled in Turkey salvaged after Arab states convince White House not to walk away from negotiations Talks between the US and Ir...

item.title: Democrats say ‘dramatic changes’ needed for immigration enforcement as DHS funding negotiations continue – live
item.description: Trump’s stopgap bill funds the department of homeland security until 13 February White House border czar says 700 federal agents will leave Minnesota ...

item.title: US agency investigates Nike for alleged discrimination against white workers
item.description: EEOC demands firm turn over ‘DEI-related objectives’ amid Trump administration’s crackdown on diversity initiatives The US Equal Employment Opportunit...

item.title: Michelle Obama documentary rises 13,000% in views as Melania film opens
item.description: Becoming garners 47.5m minutes viewed on same weekend as current first lady’s documentary released in cinemas Michelle Obama’s 2020 documentary Becomi...

item.title: Australian politics live: Wong acknowledges ‘depth of feeling’ on Herzog visit but calls for would-be protesters to ‘recall the context’
item.description: Israeli president to arrive in Australia next week. Follow today’s news live Who is Israel’s president Isaac Herzog and why is his visit to Australia ...

item.title: Ban on asylum seekers using taxis for medical appointments comes into force
item.description: It comes after a BBC investigation which showed people travelling long distances at high cost.

item.title: MPs back plan to release Mandelson files after Labour anger forces climbdown
item.description: The PM is forced to back down over a plan to withhold some documents about the ex-minister's appointment as US ambassador.

item.title: Dodds stars as GB curlers start Winter Olympics with win
item.description: Jen Dodds stars alongside Bruce Mouat to get Team GB's Winter Olympics off to a winning start in the mixed doubles curling against Norway.

item.title: Fearing Russia will seize her town, war widow moves husband's grave to Kyiv
item.description: Russia's gains on the battlefield have forced Natalia to rebury her husband in Kyiv.

item.title: Trump touts 'softer touch' on immigration as federal force is reduced in Minnesota
item.description: "Border tsar" Tom Homan said about 2,000 would remain, and the US government is equipping more officers with body-worn cameras.
